author: DigitalFreedomTech
created_time: August 06, 2023, 06:49:56 PMLast edit: August 06, 2023, 09:10:45 PM by DigitalFreedomTech
content: Project: WireGuard VPN ClientLanguage: Python preferredPlatform: Linux OnlyDistro: Debian-basedBudget: 1500 USD in cryptoPosition description:We’re a VPN company hiring a developer to make the WireGuard Linux Client for Debian based distros (Ubuntu/Mint too).  So this is just calling upon the operating system’s pre-made WireGuard functions and using IPTables for a kill switch.  You’d also be setting up WireGuard on a testing VPS, and aligning the configuration files between the server and client.Other members of the team have completed OpenVPN functionality, and the Art/GUI will also be done by a different team member.FAQ:Q: Does this role require making a Windows or Apple client?A: No, Linux onlyQ: Does this role require any art or graphical interface?A: No, coding onlyQ: Does it have to be Python?A: The OpenVPN part is in Python and Python has the most cross-platform interoperability.  But we’re open to hearing your ideas.Please email us: DigitalFreedom@skiff.com
